title: TourBox Configuration Schema
description: Defines the structure for the config.json file, used to configure the TourBox application.

serial_port.description: The serial port name where the TourBox is connected (e.g., 'COM3' on Windows, '/dev/ttyACM0' on Linux).

baud_rate.description: The communication speed for the serial port.

mappings.description: Defines the mapping from TourBox inputs to keyboard or mouse actions. The keys represent the TourBox input name, and the values are the action strings.

additionalProperties.description: The action to perform. Can be a key combination (e.g., 'CTRL+S'), a single key ('A'), or a special command ('WHEEL_UP', 'WHEEL_DOWN').
